tp.pr5.instructions

Class OperateInstruction

  • java.lang.Object
    • tp.pr5.instructions.Commands
      • tp.pr5.instructions.OperateInstruction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Instruction

    public class OperateInstruction
extends Commands
    The Instruction for using an item. This Instruction works if the user writes OPERATE id or OPERAR id
    Author:
    Abel Serrano Juste

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void execute()
      The robot uses the requested item.
      java.lang.String getHelp()
      Returns a description of how to use and which is the effect of this Instruction.
      java.lang.String getSyntax()
      Returns a short statement of the Instruction syntax.
      Instruction parse(java.lang.String cad)
      Parses the String returning an instance of OperateInstruction or throwing a WrongInstructionFormatException()
      void undo()
      Undo operate instruction, this implies revert the state of fuel and recycled material of WALL·E previously and restore the uses of the item if appropriate.
      It uses the item store in OperateInstruction, which it must be correct assigned in executed.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public void execute()
             throws InstructionExecutionException
        The robot uses the requested item.
        Throws:
        InstructionExecutionException - When the robot inventory does not contain an item with this name or when the item cannot be used

      • parse

        public Instruction parse(java.lang.String cad)
                  throws WrongInstructionFormatException
        Parses the String returning an instance of OperateInstruction or throwing a WrongInstructionFormatException()
        Parameters:
        cad - String to parse
        Returns:
        Instruction Reference to an instance of OperateInstruction
        Throws:
        WrongInstructionFormatException - When the String is not

        OPERATE|OPERAR

      • undo

        public void undo()
        Undo operate instruction, this implies revert the state of fuel and recycled material of WALL·E previously and restore the uses of the item if appropriate.
        It uses the item store in OperateInstruction, which it must be correct assigned in executed.
        Specified by:
        undo in interface Instruction
        Overrides:
        undo in class Commands

        public java.lang.String getSyntax()

        Returns a short statement of the Instruction syntax.
        Returns:
        The Instruction's syntax.
